Package org.example.springproductcatalogue.controllers

Class ProductController

java.lang.Object
org.example.springproductcatalogue.controllers.ProductController
@RestController public class ProductController extends Object
Controller class responsible for handling HTTP requests related to products. This class receives incoming requests and delegates the business logic to the ProductService.

This controller primarily deals with mapping incoming HTTP requests to corresponding methods and returning appropriate responses to the client. It interacts with the ProductService to perform CRUD operations on products and manage product-related functionalities.

  • Method Details

    • createProduct

      @CachePut(value="product", key="#product.id", unless="#product == null || #product.title == null") @PostMapping({"/products","/products/"}) public Product createProduct(@RequestBody ProductRequestDto request) throws ProductCreationException
      Controller method: Creates a new product and updates the product cache.

      Caching: After saving the product into the database, the product details are stored in the product cache for faster future retrieval.

      Parameters:
      request - The ProductRequestDto containing product details.
      Returns:
      The newly created Product object.
      Throws:
      ProductCreationException - If there is an issue creating the product.

    • getProductDetails

      @Cacheable("product") @GetMapping({"/products/{id}","/products/{id}/"}) public Product getProductDetails(@PathVariable("id") Long productId) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Controller method: Retrieves details of a product, fetching from cache if available, otherwise from the database. *
      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to retrieve. Must be a positive long integer.
      Returns:
      The Product object representing the details of the requested product.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - If the requested product is not found.

    • getProductLikeTitle

      @GetMapping({"/products-list/{title}","/products-list/{title}/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getProductLikeTitle(@PathVariable("title") String title) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Controller method: Retrieves all products with titles similar to the provided title.

      The title parameter represents the title of the products to search for.

      Parameters:
      title - The title of the products to search for.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of Product objects matching the provided title pattern.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - If no products are found with titles similar to the provided title.

    • getAllProducts

      @GetMapping({"/products","/products/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getAllProducts() throws Exception
      Controller method: Retrieves all products.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of all Product objects.
      Throws:
      Exception - If an error occurs while retrieving the products.

    • getProductsByPage

      @GetMapping({"/products/p/{pageSize}/{pageNumber}","/products/p/{pageSize}/{pageNumber}/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getProductsByPage(@PathVariable int pageSize, @PathVariable int pageNumber, @RequestParam(required=false) String sortColumn, @RequestParam(required=false) String sortDirection)
      Controller to retrieve products by page with optional sorting. Sample end point: "http://localhost:8080/products/p/5/0?sortColumn=title&sortDirection=desc"
      Parameters:
      pageSize - The number of products per page
      pageNumber - The page number
      sortColumn - (Optional) The column to sort by
      sortDirection - (Optional) The direction of sorting (asc or desc)
      Returns:
      A ResponseEntity containing a list of products

    • getProductsInCategory

      @GetMapping({"/products/category/{categoryTitle}","/products/category/{categoryTitle}/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Product>> getProductsInCategory(@PathVariable("categoryTitle") String categoryTitle) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Controller method: Retrieves products in a specific category.
      Parameters:
      categoryTitle - Title of the category.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of Product objects in the specified category.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - If no products are found in the specified category.

    • getAllCategories

      @GetMapping({"/products/categories","/products/categories/"}) public org.springframework.http.ResponseEntity<List<Category>> getAllCategories()
      Controller method: Retrieves all categories.
      Returns:
      ResponseEntity containing a list of all Category objects.

    • updateProduct

      @CachePut(value="product", key="#productId") @PutMapping({"/products/{id}","/products/{id}/"}) public Product updateProduct(@PathVariable("id") Long productId, @RequestBody ProductRequestDto request) throws ProductNotFoundException, IllegalAccessException
      Controller method: Updates details of a product and updates the product cache.

      After updating the product, the updated Product object is stored in the product cache with the specified product ID as the cache key.

      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to update. Must be a positive long integer.
      request - The ProductRequestDto containing the updated product details.
      Returns:
      The updated Product object.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - If the specified product is not found.
      IllegalAccessException - If the update operation is not permitted.

    • deleteProduct

      @CacheEvict(value="product", key="#productId") @DeleteMapping({"/products/{id}","/products/{id}/"}) public long deleteProduct(@PathVariable("id") Long productId) throws ProductNotFoundException
      Controller method: Deletes a product and removes it from the product cache.

      After deleting the product, its entry is evicted from the product cache using the specified product ID as the cache key.

      Parameters:
      productId - The ID of the product to delete. Must be a positive long integer.
      Returns:
      The ID of the deleted product.
      Throws:
      ProductNotFoundException - If the specified product is not found.
